technologies.name: Drupal
technologies.description: Drupal is a free and open-source web content management framework.

technologies.name: Apple iCloud Mail
technologies.description: Apple iCloud Mail is a webmail service provided by Apple, Inc.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Leaflet
technologies.description: Leaflet is the open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

technologies.name: YouTube
technologies.description: YouTube is a video sharing service where users can create their own profile, upload videos, watch, like and comment on other videos.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Nginx
technologies.description: Nginx is a web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache.

technologies.name: Cloudflare
technologies.description: Cloudflare is a web-infrastructure and website-security company, providing content-delivery-network services, DDoS mitigation, Internet security, and distributed domain-name-server services.

technologies.name: Linkedin Ads
technologies.description: Linkedin Ads is a paid marketing tool that offers access to Linkedin social networks through various sponsored posts and other methods.

technologies.name: Lightbox
technologies.description: Lightbox is small javascript library used to overlay images on top of the current page.

technologies.name: cdnjs
technologies.description: cdnjs is a free distributed JS library delivery service.

technologies.name: AddToAny
technologies.description: AddToAny is a universal sharing platform that can be integrated into a website by use of a web widget or plugin.

technologies.name: Twitter Ads
technologies.description: Twitter Ads is an advertising platform for Twitter 'microblogging' system.

technologies.name: Splide
technologies.description: Splide.js is a lightweight, responsive, and customizable slider and carousel library for JavaScript.

technologies.name: Matomo Tag Manager
technologies.description: Matomo Tag Manager manages tracking and marketing tags.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: Livefyre
technologies.description: Livefyre is a platform that integrates with the social web to boost social interaction.

technologies.name: Linkedin Insight Tag
technologies.description: LinkedIn Insight Tag is a lightweight JavaScript tag that powers conversion tracking, website audiences, and website demographics.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Facebook Pixel
technologies.description: Facebook pixel is an analytics tool that allows you to measure the effectiveness of your advertising.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Tippy.js
technologies.description: Tippy.js is the complete tooltip, popover, dropdown, and menu solution for the web, powered by Popper.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Popper
technologies.description: Popper is a positioning engine, its purpose is to calculate the position of an element to make it possible to position it near a given reference element.

technologies.name: RSS
technologies.description: RSS is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.
